schemas.name: camtrap-dp

subSchemas.name: deployments
subSchemas.title: Camera trap: deployments
subSchemas.description: Camera trap: deployments schema

subSchemas.name: media
subSchemas.title: Camera trap: media
subSchemas.description: Camera trap: media schema

subSchemas.name: observations
subSchemas.title: Camera trap: observations
subSchemas.description: Camera trap: observations schema

allOf.description: Required schemas must be present: deployments, media, observations

schemas.title: Camera Trap Data Package (Camtrap DP)
schemas.description: Camera Trap Data Package is a community developed data exchange format for camera trap data.

schemas.name: coldp

subSchemas.name: distribution
subSchemas.title: COL Data Package (ColDP): distribution
subSchemas.description: A structured distribution record for a taxon in a given area.

subSchemas.name: media
subSchemas.title: COL Data Package (ColDP): media
subSchemas.description: Multimedia items for a taxon such as an image, audio or video.

subSchemas.name: name-usage
subSchemas.title: COL Data Package (ColDP): name-usage
subSchemas.description: A simpler alternative to the 3 entities Name, Taxon and Synonym.

subSchemas.name: name
subSchemas.title: COL Data Package (ColDP): name
subSchemas.description: COL Data Package (ColDP): name

subSchemas.name: name-relation
subSchemas.title: COL Data Package (ColDP): name-relation
subSchemas.description: A directed nomenclatural name relation.

subSchemas.name: reference
subSchemas.title: COL Data Package (ColDP): reference
subSchemas.description: Structured bibliographic references with a unique id to refer to from other entities. References can be given either as a simple, single citation string, or in a structured form.

subSchemas.name: species-estimate
subSchemas.title: COL Data Package (ColDP): species-estimate
subSchemas.description: An estimation of the number of species for a given higher taxon, e.g. a family. The estimation must be based on a reference and should give the number of species according to a certain "type" that is expected to exist.

subSchemas.name: species-interaction
subSchemas.title: COL Data Package (ColDP): species-interaction
subSchemas.description: A directed taxon relation representing species interactions. Different to a TaxonConceptRelation a species interaction can also point to a species (name) outside of the local dataset.

subSchemas.name: synonym
subSchemas.title: COL Data Package (ColDP): synonym
subSchemas.description: A synonymous name for a taxon. Note that the same name can be linked to mulitple taxa by having several Synonym records to model pro parte synonyms.

subSchemas.name: taxon-concept-relation
subSchemas.title: COL Data Package (ColDP): taxon-concept-relation
subSchemas.description: A directed taxon relation representing RCC5 taxon concept assertions.

subSchemas.name: taxon
subSchemas.title: COL Data Package (ColDP): taxon
subSchemas.description: An accepted name with a taxonomic classification given either as a parent-child relation or as a flat, denormalized record.

subSchemas.name: treatment
subSchemas.title: COL Data Package (ColDP): treatment
subSchemas.description: Treatments are parts of publications that "treat" a single taxon. They can be an original description for a new species, but also subsequent taxonomic works and usually include several sections such as a diagnosis, description, material examied, distribution, etc.

subSchemas.name: type-material
subSchemas.title: COL Data Package (ColDP): type-material
subSchemas.description: Type material designated to names. Type material should only be associated with the original name, not with a recombination.

subSchemas.name: vernacular-name
subSchemas.title: COL Data Package (ColDP): vernacular-name
subSchemas.description: A vernacular or common name for a taxon.

allOf.description: At least one required schema present: name, taxon, reference, name-usage
If 'name', 'taxon' or 'synonym' present, then 'name-usage' must not be present
If 'name-usage' present, then 'name', 'taxon' and 'synonym' must not be present

schemas.title: Catalogue of Life Data Package (ColDP)
schemas.description: The recommended exchange format for data to and from COL ChecklistBank is a tabular text format with a fixed set of files and columns.

schemas.name: material-dp

subSchemas.name: material-entity
subSchemas.title: MaterialEntity
subSchemas.description: A material manifestation of an entity.

subSchemas.name: gathering-event
subSchemas.title: GatheringEvent
subSchemas.description: A type of Event during which Material and/or Digital Entities are gathered. The eventType is implicit.

subSchemas.name: identification
subSchemas.title: Identification
subSchemas.description: A taxonomic determination (e.g., the assignment to a taxon).

subSchemas.name: agent
subSchemas.title: Agent
subSchemas.description: An agent is something that bears some form of responsibility for an activity taking place, for the existence of an entity, or for another agent's activity (https://www.w3.org/TR/prov-o/#Agent).

subSchemas.name: digital-entity
subSchemas.title: DigitalEntity
subSchemas.description: A digital manifestation of an entity.

subSchemas.name: agent-identifier
subSchemas.title: AgentIdentifier
subSchemas.description: An alternate identifier for an Agent

subSchemas.name: material-entity-identifier
subSchemas.title: MaterialEntityIdentifier
subSchemas.description: An alternate identifier for a MaterialEntity.

subSchemas.name: digital-entity-assertion
subSchemas.title: DigitalEntityAssertion
subSchemas.description: An observation, measurement, or other statement made by an Agent with respect to a DigitalEntity.

subSchemas.name: material-entity-assertion
subSchemas.title: MaterialEntityAssertion
subSchemas.description: An observation, measurement, or other statement made by an Agent with respect to a MaterialEntity.

subSchemas.name: gathering-event-assertion
subSchemas.title: GatheringEventAssertion
subSchemas.description: An observation, measurement, or other statement made by an Agent with respect to a GatheringEvent.

subSchemas.name: material-entity-citation
subSchemas.title: MaterialEntityCitation
subSchemas.description: A record of citation against a material entity.

schemas.title: Darwin Core Material Data Package (Material DP)
schemas.description: A data package for Material focused datasets
